name: Next watering
func:
msg.payload = (msg.payload.WB2 - msg.payload.DW2).toFixed(2) + " kg";
return msg;

name: Waste full in
func:
msg.payload = (msg.payload.WL2 - msg.payload.WR2).toFixed(2) + " kg";
return msg;

name: Next watering
func:
msg.payload = (msg.payload.WB1 - msg.payload.DW1).toFixed(2) + " kg";
return msg;

name: Waste full in
func:
msg.payload = (msg.payload.WL1 - msg.payload.WR1).toFixed(2) + " kg";
return msg;
